API reference¶

ANOVA¶

anova([dv, between, data, detailed]) One-way ANOVA.
rm_anova([dv, within, data, correction, …]) One-way repeated measures ANOVA.
mixed_anova([dv, within, between, data, …]) Mixed-design (split-plot) ANOVA .

Pairwise tests¶

pairwise_ttests([dv, between, within, …]) Pairwise T-tests.

Multiple comparisons¶

multicomp(pvals[, alpha, method]) P-values correction for multiple tests.
bonf(pvals[, alpha]) P-value correction with Bonferroni method.
holm(pvals[, alpha]) P-value correction with Holm method.
fdr(pvals[, alpha, method]) P-value correction with False Discovery Rate (FDR).

Effect sizes¶

compute_effsize([dv, group, data, x, y, …]) Compute effect size from pandas dataframe or two numpy arrays.
compute_effsize_from_T(T[, nx, ny, N, eftype]) Compute effect size from a T-value.
convert_effsize(ef, input_type, output_type) Conversion between effect sizes.

Miscellaneous¶

gzscore(x) Geometric standard (Z) score.
test_normality(*args[, alpha]) Test the normality of one or more array.
test_homoscedasticity(*args[, alpha]) Test equality of variance.
test_sphericity(X[, alpha]) Mauchly’s test for sphericity
test_dist(*args[, dist]) Anderson-Darling test of distribution.
